title.en: It's Been a While Since the Original Novel Was Completed

altTitles.en: It's Been a While Since the Original Was Finished

altTitles.es: Mi vida luego de que termino la historia original

altTitles.hu: Az eredeti regény már rég véget ért

altTitles.ja: 原作はとっくに完結しましたが

description.en:
Elena Taylor, the former villainess of a romance story, has decided to walk away from the main story and open a Romance Counselling business. As an independent woman trying to find her footing in society with her fledgling venture, she is given the hardest request she’s ever encountered: help the sub-lead of the main plot, Hugh Godwin, debut in High-Society and get married, or get kicked out of the building she lives and works out of! Elena soon realizes that she’s in trouble when she meets Hugh, a burly, muscular bear of a knight who’s been burned by love. Will Elena be able to convince Hugh to find romance and keep her business running?

---
Elena Taylor, who played the role of the villain in the original novel, decides not to get entangled in relationships with the original story and establishes a Love Counseling Center.

Elena, after establishing herself a Love Counseling Center and was living a new life, is given a request with the highest difficulty. To safely debut Hugh, who was the second male lead in the original novel, and save his wife! However, Hugh, who was serious about the Urak Village Movement, was a born-to-be single who was not interested in dating at all. 

Will Elena be able to complete the request safely and live happily?
description.hu: Elena Taylor a regény antihőse kellene, hogy legyen, azonban megspórolja az ezzel járó nyűgöt: nem áll a koronaherceg, Lian és Astel szerelmének útjába, helyette beleveti magát a randizásba. A randizással szerzett tudását pedig kamatoztatja is hősnőnk a sikeres vállalkozásában, Elena Taylor Kapcsolati Tanácsadó Irodájában. Itt találkozik Elena az eredeti regény egyik szereplőjének, Hugh Godwinnak az édesanyjával, aki arra kéri őt, segítsen feleséget találni a fiának. Hugh viszont a szerelmi csalódása után már nem az a férfi, akiről Elena a regényben olvasott... (Ez nem az eredeti leírás, nem szeretem azt használni)
description.ko:
원작의 악녀 역할이었던 엘레나 테일러는 원작의 모든 관계를 때려치우고 연애상담소를 차린다.
연애 상담소로 자리를 잡고 새 인생을 살아가던 엘레나에게 최고 난이도의 의뢰가 주어지는데..
원작의 서브 남주였던 휴를 무사히 사교계에 데뷔시키고 혼처를 구하는 것!

하지만 우락부락 운동에 진심이 된 휴는 연애에 전혀 관심이 없는 모태솔로였다.
과연 엘레나는 무사히 의뢰를 마치고 행복하게 살 수 있을까?
